nodes.text: 'Dragged'? Why does the scientific community seek to drag religions into changing their beliefs? Can't they just ignore them?

No one really dragged anyone, marc. I was doing what is called 'making a joke.' You need a sense of humor to understand this. The idea behind the humor was that it seems that in 2008 any person or institution that does not understand that evolution is a fact is indeed backward in their thinking. In that they finally recognized a commonly accepted fact so late, it would seem they were hitherto reluctant. Hence the 'kicking and screaming' reference. Sheesh, if you have to explain it...
